name: sagewave
description:
This is mostly a tech demo music visualizer right now with the intent of being a video game later. Am testing my audio systems first, to ensure it works well enough.

up/down arrows will change volume db by 3, capped at 0 and -80
left/right arrows will seek by 15 seconds

ctrl/left will reset song to start

**H** - hide/unhide threshold values for transience detection

Drag  ogg/wav/MP3 files into window to start playing song, will play on repeat

F11 to enable/disable transparent background
